code: import React from"react";import Button from"@material-ui/core/Button";import Dialog from"@material-ui/core/Dialog";import DialogActions from"@material-ui/core/DialogActions";import DialogContent from"@material-ui/core/DialogContent";import DialogTitle from"@material-ui/core/DialogTitle";import Typography from"@material-ui/core/Typography";import{i18n}from"../../translate/i18n";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConfirmationModal=_ref=>{let{title,children,open,onClose,onConfirm}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dialog,{open:open,onClose:()=>onClose(false),"aria-labelledby":"confirm-dialog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogTitle,{id:"confirm-dialog",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogContent,{dividers:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{children:children})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:()=>onClose(false),color:"default",children:i18n.t("confirmationModal.buttons.cancel")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:()=>{onClose(false);onConfirm();},color:"secondary",children:i18n.t("confirmationModal.buttons.confirm")})]})]});};export default ConfirmationModal;
